lesson.title: Congratulations!
lesson.summary: You've now reached the end of this program!

atoms.text:
Congratulations, you have completed the program! With 3 new projects in your portfolio, you have applied all the common machine learning algorithms from unsupervised to supervised learning techniques, and you are one step closer to reaching your goals as a learner and machine learning specialist.


Our team at Udacity congratulates you on arriving at this incredible moment in your progress! This is an extremely exciting time, and now you are ready to enroll in Advanced Machine Learning. You can enroll in Term 2 via the link in your Classroom. Navigate to the Term 2 module within your Classroom content and click on the enrollment link to be taken to the checkout page for the next upcoming Term 2 class. 

If you would prefer to complete your Nanodegree program in the subscription version, please note that **you would lose access to your Term 1 content upon enrolling in the subscription version.** Before you enroll, please save any lecture videos, projects, project reviews, or other materials from Term 1 that you would like to maintain access to.

The future awaits!
